RankDef.description: A novice investigator learning to identify heresy and threats to temple doctrine.
An investigator skilled in questioning suspects and uncovering hidden truths.
A sharp-eyed investigator trained to detect deception and uncover hidden truths.
An experienced inquisitor with the authority to lead investigations and judge minor heretics.
A master investigator with the authority to judge heretics and command lesser inquisitors.
The supreme authority of the Inquisition, feared by heretics and respected by the faithful.
The ultimate master of the Order of Inquisition, commanding all investigations and judgment, answering only to the Alma Rula.
